database.name: MetabolomicsWorkbench
database.description: The Metabolomics Workbench will serve as a national and international repository for metabolomics data and metadata and will provide analysis tools and access to metabolite standards, protocols, tutorials, training, and more.

entry.name: NMR analysis of Synthetic Mixture Analysis
entry.description: Two groups of mixtures with 5 replicates each were each made using 20 synthetic metabolites. Some metabolites were at equal concentrations in both groups, and 10 metabolites differed between groups with half higher in group A, and half higher in group B.

additional_fields.field: Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology /SECIM, University of Florida
